channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Expert Witness
channel.desc: A skilled expert witness does more than just analyse existing evidence. They guide detectives towards new clues that can turn a case. That is what happened in the case of Lynette White, where a forensic scientist helped police locate new evidence to find the real killer after five men had been wrongfully arrested for the crime. Our next case reveals how forensic analysis of fragments of CCTV footage blew apart a suspect's alibi and identified him as the killer.
